Trade/Device Name(s): BIOFIRE SPOTFIRE Respiratory/Sore Throat (R/ST) Panel Mini
Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The Sars-Cov-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Multi-Target Respiratory Specimen Nucleic Acid Test Including SARS-CoV-2 And Other Microbial Agents
Specimen Container(s): Transport media (e.g., Amies media, Viral Transport Media, BD Universal Viral Transport, Remel MicroTest M4RT Multi-Microbe Media)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BIOFIRE SPOTFIRE Respiratory/Sore Throat (R/ST) Panel Mini multiplex PCR assay for qualitative detection of respiratory viral and bacterial nucleic acids
Indications for Use Summary: Multiplex PCR assay for qualitative detection and identification of multiple respiratory viral and bacterial nucleic acids in nasopharyngeal or throat swab specimens from individuals with respiratory tract infection or pharyngitis symptoms, for use with the BIOFIRE SPOTFIRE System
